patterns.component_pattern: React functional components with TypeScript, using hooks (useState, useEffect, useCallback)
patterns.api_pattern: All API calls go through discovery-api.ts helper functions with Bearer token authentication
patterns.styling_pattern: Tailwind CSS classes with dark mode variants (dark:bg-[color])
patterns.radix_ui_pattern: Radix UI components are unstyled and require manual styling with Tailwind
patterns.state_management: Local component state with useState/useCallback, no global state management needed for this feature

existing_implementations.description: DiscoveryQueue.tsx already exists with card display, filtering, bulk selection, and action handlers (approve, reject, dismiss)
api_functions_available: bulkReviewCards(token, cardIds, action): Promise<{processed: number, errors: string[]}>

conventions.naming: camelCase for variables/functions, PascalCase for components
conventions.imports: Organize imports: React, external libraries, local components, types/interfaces
conventions.file_structure: Pages in src/pages/, components in src/components/, hooks in src/hooks/, lib in src/lib/
conventions.typescript: Use explicit types for props and state, avoid 'any' type
